name: index.html
description: Main HTML file for the calculator application

features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Allow users to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division

features.name: Advanced Operations
features.description: Include functionalities for exponentiation, square root, factorial, and trigonometric functions

features.name: Memory Functions
features.description: Provide options to store and recall numbers from memory

features.name: History Tracking
features.description: Keep track of the calculation history for reference and review

file_instruction: The index.html file serves as the main HTML file for the calculator application. It includes the basic structure of the webpage layout and links to the CSS stylesheet for styling. JavaScript functionality for the calculator operations is linked through the app.js file.
